website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo IdeaPad Y700-17 is an excellent entry-level gaming laptop with a big screen and fast hardware. It can play demanding games smoothly at moderate to high settings, and you get plenty of storage, good port options, and a killer sound system in the bargain.
pros: Plenty of storage, including a solid-state boot drive
cons: Keyboard is small and awkwardly situated

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast and perfect for gaming I even use it as a work computer
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo Support dept sends reams of uniltelligible instructions which I follow to the best of my ability with no result
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing purchase: Constant problems with graphics card dropping out and broadband internet dropout: Lenovo Support dept sends reams of uniltelligible instructions which I follow to the best of my ability with no result.They say I'm not entitled to a refund as its a known software problem . Now wi-fi card problems mean turning computer on and off several times every morning to get internet connection.Software problem or not: it's not fixed,and at over £1k purchase price it's not fit for purpose: I wish I had bought it from John Lewis who I'm sure would have replaced it by now (It's still under guarantee - only 6 months old).
customer_reviews.author: PeterEastAngular

customer_reviews.title: This model of laptop regularly crashes.
customer_reviews.text: The laptop would regularly crash a few times a day. This started about 2 days after purchase. This is actually the second time I bought this laptop model. I bought one from PC world and it crashed a lot. Thought it was a faulty machine so returned it and bought a new one from amazon. Exact same crashing problem. I love Lenovo laptops but I cannot recommend this model. Contacted Lenovo and they told me to do a lot of things, none worked and they conceded that the laptop was faulty and had to be returned on both occasions. Either I'm super unlucky or this model isn't trustworthy.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Writing this review on the laptop. I bought it to replace my 3 year old laptop. This would be my first laptop with a video card and first AMD laptop. It seems to work pretty well and holds up satisfactorily with my Steam collection.
customer_reviews.author: AKU

customer_reviews.title: Marcin
customer_reviews.text: 4 months old. Black screen stay black for good. Send for repair. 1k laptop 4 months old already dead. Waste your money DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.author: Marcin Mazur

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop overall
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop overall, except Lenovo didn't supply the SATA cable/socket inside for second HDD! I contacted Lenovo who called it a "replacement part", yet it isn't replacing anything since they never fitted it in the first place lol! And they couldn't source the part. Had to go to a local computer shop who sourced it from an international company. Expected better from Lenovo. Was going to order in excess of 100 laptops for work, but will stick with Dell after that rather stupid experience with Lenovo support.
customer_reviews.author: C Noble

customer_reviews.title: The pc is ok, its AMAZON that are the ...
customer_reviews.text: The pc is ok, its AMAZON that are the lying scumbags. This pc's screen is not touch!!! FALSE ADVERTISEMENT
customer_reviews.author: Michael Theodoulides

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard sometime is not working after u using it for more than 24hrs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False manufacturer information
customer_reviews.text: It is completely false that this product has a touch screen. It does not, and Amazon know it, but they continue to advertise it. Also, the track pad button is extremely stiff to depress. Get used to tap clicking because that's what you'll end up doing.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Heidesch

customer_reviews.title: No internal DVD!
customer_reviews.text: As an advertised gaming laptop would have thought it would have come with an internal dvd/blue ray drive. Personally do not want to have to carry around an external dvd player and a laptop, returned for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Pavman

customer_reviews.title: Warning !!!!
customer_reviews.text: i bought laptop with 256SDD thinking i will be able to put some 2tb disc inside. But this laptop is missing mount with screws and cable to install additional HDD and such parts are not easy to get if possible at all. I end up with laptop with 256 gb disc. Even my old laptop had 1tb.
customer_reviews.author: Mateusz

customer_reviews.title: Best value for money laptop on the market!! Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I have the i7 16GB, 512 GB SSD, 4K edition with GTX 960M 4GB version of this laptop and in my opinion it is simply amazing value for money. I use this laptop as a mobile workstation and it is by far the best laptop I have ever used (previously used a Dell Latitude, MacBook Pro and Alienware 17), confidently recommend this to anyone interested in a gaming laptop!!
customer_reviews.author: Erdem Pulcu

customer_reviews.title: Poor for the price
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy. Screen flickers and flashes. Laptop keeps saying graphic card error. DVD drive is external! At this price I expect quality and this is not a great result.
customer_reviews.author: R
